```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE, fig.width=12, fig.height=8) # global settings
```


```{r}
library(knitr)
library(kableExtra)
library(readr)

setwd("~/")
lakeData<-read.csv("Lake_Info_2020.csv")
lakeInfo<-data.frame(ID<-lakeData$lakeID,name<-lakeData$lakeName, lat<-lakeData$lat, long<-lakeData$long, DOC<-lakeData$DOC..mg.L.)

colnames(lakeInfo)[1] <- "Lake ID"
colnames(lakeInfo)[2] <- "Lake Name"
colnames(lakeInfo)[3] <- "Latitude"
colnames(lakeInfo)[4] <- "Longitude"
colnames(lakeInfo)[5] <- "DOC mg/L"

kable(lakeInfo) %>%
  kable_styling(bootstrap_options ="striped")%>%
  row_spec(0,bold=T)



```

```{r, results='asis'}
kable(lakeInfo,"latex") %>%
  kable_styling(latex_options ="striped")%>%
  row_spec(0,bold=T)
```
